definition: without defense, lacking weapons for self-defense
details:
adverb
- without defense
= example: without defense
= synonyms: defenceless, defenselessly, defencelessly
adjective
- lacking weapons for self-defense
= synonyms: defenceless
- having no protecting or concealing cover
= synonyms: naked
- lacking protection or support
= example: lacking protection or support
= synonyms: defenceless
